data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Charlotte, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Charlotte, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 38,000 people living in Charlotte.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Charlotte, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Charlotte with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Byera Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Byera Village, Charlotte, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Charlotte, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Charlotte, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.focus_label: Charlotte, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 15,591 believers in the state of Charlotte to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

location.name: Charlotte
location.full_name: Charlotte, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
